meanings.sent1: I collected colorful leafs in the park.
meanings.sent2: The tree was covered in green leafs.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used the leafs to build a cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: The forest floor was carpeted with fallen leafs.
meanings.sent5: The autumn wind rustled the leafs on the ground.

meanings.sent1: She leafs through the book to find her favorite chapter.
meanings.sent2: He leafs through the magazine at the waiting room.
meanings.sent3: The student leafs through the textbook before the exam.
meanings.sent4: The librarian leafs through the pages of the old manuscript.
meanings.sent5: The detective leafs through the files for clues.

meanings.sent1: In spring, the trees leafs out with fresh green leaves.
meanings.sent2: The plant leafs out after a period of dormancy.
meanings.sent3: The garden leafs out beautifully in the warm weather.
meanings.sent4: The bushes leafs out with vibrant colors in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The vine leafs out and climbs up the trellis.
